Key Match Events: The Celtics ripped off a 15-0 run in the fourth quarter to pull away.
Jayson Tatum dropped a game-high 29 points and Jrue Holiday contributed with 19 points and seven assists.
Kristaps Porzingis had a standout performance with 25 points and 11 rebounds.
Post-Match Reflections: Jrue Holiday praised Kristaps Porzingis for his performance.
The Celtics finished their four-game road trip with a 3-1 record.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Nuggets were missing star Nikola Jokic due to illness.
The Celtics' strategy involved a focus on three-point shooting despite the Nuggets' efforts to counter it.
Others: The game was a hard-fought victory for the Celtics, highlighting their resilience.
The Celtics will next face the Sacramento Kings on Friday.
